title: Understanding Divorce Proceedings in Singapore
content: Divorce in Singapore is governed by the Women's Charter. This comprehensive guide covers the grounds for divorce, the process of filing, and what to expect during proceedings. Key points include: 1) Irretrievable breakdown must be proven, 2) Minimum 3-year marriage requirement, 3) Mediation is encouraged before court proceedings.
summary: Complete guide to divorce proceedings under Singapore law, including requirements, process, and timeline.

title: Employment Contract Essentials
content: Every employment relationship in Singapore should be governed by a clear contract. This article explains the essential terms that must be included, statutory requirements under the Employment Act, and common clauses that protect both employers and employees.
summary: Essential guide to employment contracts in Singapore, covering mandatory terms and best practices.

title: Property Purchase Process in Singapore
content: Buying property in Singapore involves multiple steps and legal requirements. This guide covers the Option to Purchase, Sales & Purchase Agreement, legal searches, and completion process. Special attention is given to HDB and private property differences.
summary: Step-by-step guide to purchasing property in Singapore, covering legal requirements and procedures.
